headline: Business Analyst | Data Analyst | Python Developer | R | SQL | ArcGIS | Power BI | Excel | VBA | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | UML | BPMN-DMN-CMMN
summary:
Thuc calls it the universal rule: 𝗖𝗼𝗻𝗳𝗹𝘂𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 + 𝗜𝗻𝗳𝗹𝘂𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲 = 𝗔𝗳𝗳𝗹𝘂𝗲𝗻𝗰𝗲

🎯 8+ Years of experience as a Business Analyst, Data Analyst, and Business Intelligence Specialist. 
🎯 Experience in various industries: Consumer Finance, Manufacturing, Game, and Business Process Outsourcing.
🎯 Fast and smart working style, everlearning attitude, and unceasing discovery.

𝗦𝗸𝗶𝗹𝗹𝘀
🚀 Exploratory Data Analysis, Data Mining, Data Modelling, Data Visualization, Statistics, Machine Learning
🚀 Requirements Elicitation, Business Process Mapping, Project Management, User Acceptance Testing (UAT)

🚀 Python: Flask, Dash, FastAPI, Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Plotly, Seaborn, Bokeh, Scikit-learn, Tkinter, Requests, Urllib3, Selenium, BeautifulSoup, Pytest, PyInstaller
🚀 R: dplyr, reshape2, ggplot2, rpivotTable, tidyverse, tidyr, shiny, plotly, Hmisc, Rcpp, TTR, zoo, prob, forecast
🚀 Database: Oracle PL/SQL Developer, MySQL Workbench, SQLite, Microsoft SQL Server, Microsoft Access

🚀 VBA, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript
🚀 Excel, Power BI, Tableau, ArcGIS, Google Data Studio
🚀 Google Analytics, Twitter Analytics, Facebook Business Suite
🚀 UML, Camunda BPMN-DMN-CMMN, Microsoft Visio, Microsoft Project

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Sofvie Analytics Scholarship - Winter 2022
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
Your valued company is doing well, but you are afraid that traditional wisdom will become a permanent creed, hence needing a new factor. Whom should you look for? Let me help you with the title: Business Analytics Specialist. This specialist will bring the future to the present and value from the past. Amazing if you remember that “The only thing that we learn from history is that we learn nothing from history.”, as the philosopher Georg Hegel famously said.

In a nutshell, a Business Analytics expert balances an in-depth understanding of statistics, IT, and programming with business insights and communication skills. The expert can analyze past business performance with the use of descriptive, exploratory, and explanatory analytics. On the other hand, he or she is able to predict future events and improve decision-making through predictive analytics, prescriptive analytics, and experimental analytics.

Here I would like to give you another view of Business Analytics that is not shown in those job descriptions. Let’s talk about a race. In this event, speed is undoubtedly critical; however, the rate of speed change, or acceleration has a more decisive influence. If you are so tired that no more acceleration is obtained when approaching the finish line, you are prone to lose as opponents speed up in their final stage. Obviously, you will win the race if you finish in the shortest time. To achieve such time, you need to be good at timing with proper acceleration during several periods.

Your business is analogous to a race: power is speed; decision making is timing. In business, your power relies on 3 Ps: people, process, and product. Also note that if your power is constant, or speed is unchanged, you may be defeated in the game. A Business Analytics professional can help you build acceleration, i.e., keep your power increasing. Besides, data-driven decision-making is the ultimate goal to be expected in any Business Analytics Specialist.

accomplishment_honors_awards.title: Cambrian College International Excellence Bursary - Fall 2021
accomplishment_honors_awards.description:
Academic study is a journey where the starting point and the destination are not as important as the experience throughout. My educational background has been incredibly valuable and rewarding for someone who returned to academics after working for nine years. On this journey, I have embraced the unfamiliar. I have adapted to many new transitions: not being in my homeland, embracing new educational values, learning in a multicultural environment, and coping with the pandemic. There has been an unprecedented shift from the traditional classes to adjusting to hybrid and flexible classes, both close-in-time and far-in-space, navigating independent yet interactive learning. Fortunately, my carefully considered choice of studying at Cambrian College brought me many valuable lessons beyond knowledge. Resilience and determination were some of the many lessons I learned from my first program of I.T. Business Analysis and my current program of Business Analytics. 

I have made many discoveries about myself during this process, but I feel there are three crucial self-discoveries: 
•	Never underestimate the usefulness of any learning
•	Don’t overestimate yourself
•	Sharing and caring to promote productivity and open opportunities

As I have written in a post on the Facebook group of Vietnamese students at Cambrian College, going to school does not mean paying 100% attention to studying. Learning is a process of knowledge accumulation and a self-discovery journey. You can enrich your student’s life with self-reflection and out-of-textbook lessons, try to multiply findings and experiences with your social circle, and seek opportunities to apply your knowledge to solve a real problem. Now you are confident in life after graduation.

accomplishment_projects.title: Maya Academy of Advanced Cinematics
accomplishment_projects.description:

• Components: website of aesthetic appeal and effect, including e-magazine posting, and flawless responsive design
• Methodology: Agile

accomplishment_projects.title: Sora Japanese E-learning Platform
accomplishment_projects.description:
• The client - Sora is a Japanese learning platform that provides video-on-demand, 1-on-1 and group class on Japanese aiming at dominating the South East Asia market. They needed to perform all learning activities on their website.
• Components: website, learning management system, live streaming system, online testing system
• Methodology: Agile

accomplishment_projects.title: Billing System Validation
accomplishment_projects.description:
Project description:
- Seek discrepancy in billing process of a key multinational telecommunication corporation
- Communicate with client sales to help them protect revenue
- Create weekly report and discuss pending issues with our client 

I contributed to adjust the data processing method for better working efficiency.

accomplishment_projects.title: Contract Profitability Dashboard
accomplishment_projects.description:
Project description:
- Keep track of monthly revenue through mass data extraction and processing
- Aggregate and analyze relevant data of cost to update important figures and indexes
- Create monthly profitability report to a key multinational telecommunication corporation

I put the quality control phase into a unified system. I also automated parts of Excel files with VBA programming and modified tools written in VBA for the ease of control and friendly user interface.

accomplishment_projects.title: Network Configuration Setting
accomplishment_projects.description:
Project description:
- Configure clear and correct parameters of a network based on customer's specification in Excel files
- Upload Excel files to a database program which is used by local network technician to set up a site

I contributed to write VBA code for the Excel file to run as desired behavior and prevent human error: Options must be selected in strictly specific cascaded order. In addition, data in this file have mutual relationship and follow a validation.

volunteer_work.title: Digital Literacy Assistant of the Virtual Service Hubs Project
volunteer_work.description:
• Support adults and seniors to improve their digital literacy skills in small group settings as well as through one-on-one sessions
• Help individuals learn how to use devices (desktops, laptops, smartphones, tablets, MiFi, etc.) and browse the Internet so they can access virtual services, such as online doctor's appointments, Ontario Telemedicine Network, Ontario Virtual Care Clinic, LifeLabs, Health Sciences North Virtual Emergency Department request
• Guide people to create video conferences, social media accounts (Facebook, Twitter, etc.), and emails, learn to stay safe online, and protect their privacy in the digital environment.
• Troubleshoot any problems with devices, software, and mobile applications.

volunteer_work.title: Volunteer of "Step Up" Project in Phuong Thinh Commune, Cao Lanh District, Dong Thap Province
volunteer_work.description:
This voluntary activity was held by Vietnamese volunteers of ECO Vietnam Group and Singaporean students of Nanyang Girls’ High School.

Experience:
• Supporting Singaporean students in communicating with local people and protecting them from potential danger
• Sharing knowledge of Vietnamese custom and help them form a good relationship with local people
• Experiencing the life in a poor village with daily local work
• Assisting in nature conservation with planting trees
• Helping workers to build houses for poor people
• Repairing a road which is damaged by the previous flood
• Teaching English in an elementary school
• Singing and dancing in Cultural Night

volunteer_work.title: Volunteer of Earth Hour 2011 in Ho Chi Minh City
volunteer_work.description:
This voluntary activity was held with cooperation between environmental clubs in Ho Chi Minh City.
In this event, I was the secretary of the Human Resources team and a leader of 1 of 8 volunteer groups.

Experience:

• Communicating with volunteers through email, phone, or speaking face-to-face
• Inspiring objectives among volunteers, delivering tasks, supervising activities and accessing contributions
• Solving trouble between organizers and volunteers
• Recording internal information and writing minutes of meetings

This sporting event was held by the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism of Vietnam with the participation of 43 Asian countries.

The Indian team really appreciated my support as well as my local hand-made presents.

recommendations:
Aditya Phadke



I have worked with Thuc between September 2021 and December 2021. Thuc Dao took ANA1001 - Programming for Analytics with me. He was one of the top scorers and best performers in the course. He always handed in his work on time, and went above and beyond to perform exceptionally in each assignment. He showed professionalism in his work as well as how he carried himself. I am confident in his abilities to do well in absolutely anything he chooses to do!

Brady Vallbacka



Thuc is a high-achiever who demonstrates advanced Microsoft Excel skills. He is also well-versed in Power BI & R. Thuc leads by example by tutoring his fellow students and taking the lead in group projects to achieve high success. For employers looking for an individual that combines strong programming, data visualization and problem-solving skills Thuc demonstrates them with high effectiveness.

Jenna Guse



I have known Thuc since September 2021 as his professor in QMM1001 Statistics for Data Analytics. He was the top student academically in my class. I was consistently impressed by his creative solutions to problems, his ability to clearly communicate findings, and his hard work ethic. Business Analytics is a very demanding program and despite taking courses virtually and working from a different time zone Thuc met all assessment deadlines and submitted work of the highest quality. This demonstrated his time management skills and commitment to his studies.

An LE



Dao Duy Thuc is a reliable expert for every technical or tool-relating issues in our team, especially for any advanced MS Office and VBA requirements, which is extremely helpful for data analyzing.
